<:WTS:708489317168971778> Windows 98 laptop 5GB storage. It comes with the charger and a SNES to parallel port adapter to play games with a SNES controller, the required drivers for this to work are already installed there is even an ood version of Joy2Key on it that is compatible with this controller. So it has a Parallel port to which the controller will be connected to and also a disc drive but no game port but to my knowledge tjat port was primarily used for game controllers which is not an issue because the snes controller and adapter are included.
Sam n Max and Slipheed games are installed in the computer.
